mapper.select: select a.seq, a.acOrderStatus, ( select count(*) from individualorder as b where 1=1 AND a.seq = b.acOrder_seq ) as ioCount, a.acOrderDateTime, a.account_seq, ac.acName from acorder a JOIN account ac ON ac.seq = a.account_seq where 1=1 AND a.seq = #{acOrder_seq} AND a.acOrderDelNy = 0 ORDER BY seq desc

select a.seq ,a.aoQuantity ,a.aoStatus ,a.aoDateTime ,a.account_seq ,ac.acName ,a.grocery_seq ,gc.gcName ,gc.gcPrice ,(a.aoQuantity * gc.gcPrice) AS aoTotal ,a.member_seq ,mb.mbName from acorder a JOIN account ac ON ac.seq = a.account_seq JOIN grocery gc ON gc.seq = a.grocery_seq JOIN member mb ON mb.seq = a.member_seq where 1=1 AND a.aoDelNy = 0 ORDER BY seq desc
